name: Up We Go
description:
In this game you travel arround a solar system an try to inhabit new worlds, the only problem is that you rid them of all their resources till they vanish into nothingness.The direction of the worlds bridge is always turning and you have to give it a push!. Your resources are very limited so planing ahead is recomended for this trip, but dont take too long or the push will be made for you and maybe get you drifting through space.

Made during the global game jam 2015

Team:

  • Emiliano Carmona (@elcarmon)
  • Federico de Tezanos Pinto (@FedericoDETP )
  • Juan Afon (@ClairvoyanceDev)
  • Manuel brizuela
  • Irregular DS

Credits to teknoaxe for the music, @teknoaxe .
